Here is the list of signs with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - The fire sign's impulsiveness can be both a strength and weakness, making it inconsistent.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Practicality and stability make this earth sign reliable, but also risk-averse.
3. Gemini - 6/10 - Quick wit and adaptability are major strengths, but inconsistency and restlessness hinder consistency.
4. Cancer - 9/10 - Emotional intelligence and nurturing nature make it empathetic, but moodiness can be overwhelming.
5. Leo - 8.5/10 - Confidence and charisma shine bright, but ego and pride can lead to arrogance.
6. Virgo - 7.5/10 - Attention to detail and analytical mind are impressive, but perfectionism can become an obsession.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomacy and social ease make it a great mediator, but indecision and people-pleasing can be drawbacks.
8. Scorpio - 9.5/10 - Passionate intensity and intuition make it powerful, but secrecy and possessiveness can be intense.
9. Sagittarius - 7.5/10 - Adventurous spirit and optimism are inspiring, but recklessness and tactlessness can hinder progress.
10. Capricorn - 8.5/10 - Ambition and discipline drive success, but rigidity and seriousness can make it hard to connect.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian instincts and innovative thinking are groundbreaking, but detachment and aloofness can be isolating.
12. Pisces - 6.5/10 - Empathetic intuition and creativity shine, but dreaminess and lack of boundaries can lead to confusion.
Note: These scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations.
